mrt itself is not sufficient, it needs also proper feeder bus system so that many people can actually find mass transit useful. meanwhile, the cost of operating mass transit is a huge challenge, and to push the cost completely to passengers is not viable, the operator of mass transit needs foresight to collect other revenue through side income. otherwise you can have a huge mass transit system, but ticket price too high that people rather drive, bike, or uber.
